Class SpaceShip

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.SpaceShip
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class SpaceShip extends Object implements Serializable

SpaceShip

Represents the player's ship in the game. The spaceship is a grid of components, dynamically assembled by the player, and responsible for handling structure validation, component effects, combat resolution, and state updates.

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • SpaceShip

      public SpaceShip(GameModeType type, Player player)
      Constructs a SpaceShip object.
      Parameters:
      type - GameModeType Type of the ship.
      player - Player Player it belongs to.

  • Method Details

    • getType

      public GameModeType getType()

    • getCrew

      public int[] getCrew()
      Returns the count of crew members by type (index 0 = human, 1 = brown, 2 = purple).
      Returns:
      An array of crew counts.

    • bulkVerify

      public VerifyResult[][] bulkVerify()
      Performs a bulk verification of all components in the ship. Returns a 2D matrix of VerifyResult.
      Returns:
      Verification result grid.

    • bulkVerifyResult

      public boolean bulkVerifyResult()
      Returns true if no broken components are found.
      Returns:
      Overall ship integrity status.

    • getBlobsSize

      public int getBlobsSize()
      Returns the number of distinct component blobs (connected groups).
      Returns:
      Number of blobs.

    • updateShipBlobs

      public void updateShipBlobs()
      Updates the list of "blobs" composing the SpaceShip. Blobs are sets of connected components.

    • verifyBlob

      private ArrayList<ShipCoords> verifyBlob(VerifyResult[][] map, ShipCoords starting_point)
      Utility method, uses a BFS to build a list of coordinates pointing to all components part of the same blob.
      Parameters:
      map - Matrix of VerifyResult used to check which coordinates were already visited.
      starting_point - ShipCoords Starting point of the BFS.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of ShipCoords containting all coordinates of all blob components.

    • selectShipBlob

      public void selectShipBlob(ShipCoords blob_coord) throws ForbiddenCallException
      Selects a blob from SpaceShip containing the specified coordinate, discarding all other components contained in other blobs.
      Parameters:
      blob_coord - ShipCoords Coordinate belonging to the blob to keep.
      Throws:
      ForbiddenCallException - if only one blob exists.
      IllegalTargetException - if the coordinates are invalid.

    • addComponent

      public void addComponent(BaseComponent component, ShipCoords coords)
      Adds a component to the SpaceShip at the specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      component - BaseComponent The component to add.
      coords - ShipCoords The location to place it.
      Throws:
      IllegalComponentAdd - if the location is illegal or occupied.
      IllegalTargetException - if not adjacent to any existing component.

    • removeComponent

      public void removeComponent(ShipCoords coords)
      Removes the component at the given coordinates and updates the ship state.
      Parameters:
      coords - ShipCoords Coordinates of the component to remove.
      Throws:
      IllegalTargetException - if no component is present at the location.

    • updateShip

      public void updateShip()
      Updates the ship state based on the currently installed components. Calculates crew, power, containers, cannon power, engine power.

    • resetPower

      public void resetPower()
      Resets all powered components (e.g., cannons, engines) to their unpowered state.

    • turnOn

      public void turnOn(ShipCoords coords_target, ShipCoords battery_location)
      Powers on a target component using a battery located at another coordinate
      Parameters:
      coords_target - ShipCoords Coordinates to the target component.
      battery_location - ShipCoords Coordinates to the battery component.
      Throws:
      IllegalTargetException - if invalid component or battery ShipCoords.

    • getComponent

      public BaseComponent getComponent(ShipCoords coords)
      Returns the component at the specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      coords - ShipCoords Location to retrieve.
      Returns:
      BaseComponent Component Reference, corresponding to getEmpty() if not set or invalid.
      Throws:
      OutOfBoundsException - if coordinates are outside grid.

    • getCannonPower

      public double getCannonPower()

    • getEnginePower

      public int getEnginePower()

    • getEnergyPower

      public int getEnergyPower()
      Returns the number of batteries present.
      Returns:
      Battery count.

    • getShieldedDirections

      public boolean[] getShieldedDirections()
      Returns a boolean array indicating shield coverage in the 4 directions.
      Returns:
      Array of booleans.

    • getHeight

      public int getHeight()
      Returns the height of the ship's grid.
      Returns:
      Height.

    • getWidth

      public int getWidth()
      Returns the width of the ship's grid.
      Returns:
      Width.

    • getEmpty

      public BaseComponent getEmpty()
      Returns the ship's reference to its EmptyComponent.
      Returns:
      BaseComponent reference to owned EmptyComponent.

      public void addStorageCoords(ShipCoords coords)

    • delPowerableCoords

      public void delPowerableCoords(ShipCoords coords)

    • getTotalCrew

      public int getTotalCrew()
      Returns the total number of crew members.
      Returns:
      Total number of crew members.

    • findConnectedCabins

      public ArrayList<ShipCoords> findConnectedCabins()
      Finds cabins that are connected to at least one other cabin.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of ShipCoords, each one pointing to a CabinComponent that is adjacent to another CabinComponent.

    • countExposedConnectors

      public int countExposedConnectors()
      Counts how many exposed connectors are not connected to other components.
      Returns:
      The number of exposed connectors.

    • handleMeteorite

      public void handleMeteorite(Projectile p)
      Handles an incoming meteorite based on its direction and offset. Applies shield logic and potentially removes BaseComponent .
      Parameters:
      p - Projectile Meteor to handle.

    • handleShot

      public void handleShot(Projectile p)
      Handles a laser shot based on direction and offset. Applies shield logic and removes first impacted component if not deflected or shielded.
      Parameters:
      p - Projectile The projectile to handle.

    • normalizeRoll

      private int normalizeRoll(ProjectileDirection direction, int roll)

    • getFirst

      private ShipCoords getFirst(ProjectileDirection d, int index)

    • constructCol

      private BaseComponent[] constructCol(int index)
      Parameters:
      index - Index of the column to fetch.
      Returns:
      An Array of BaseComponent representing all components along a column of the SpaceShip.

    • findCannon

      private boolean findCannon(ProjectileDirection d, int index)

    • getContains

      public int[] getContains()
      Returns the current cargo quantities stored in the ship.
      Returns:
      Array of integers representing the total sum of each ShipmentType.

    • isCabin

      public boolean isCabin(ShipCoords coords)
      Checks if the provided coordinates belong to a cabin component.
      Parameters:
      coords - ShipCoords Coordinate to verify.
      Returns:
      true if it is a cabin, false otherwise.

    • getClientSpaceShip

      public ClientSpaceShip getClientSpaceShip()
      Converts the internal ship state to a serializable ClientSpaceShip used for network transmission to clients.
      Returns:
      ClientSpaceShip A complete client-side representation of the ship
